def include?(key)
  super(remove_multiparameter_id(key))
end

remove_multiparameter_id(key) click to toggle source 
# File lib/active_model/mass_assignment_security/permission_set.rb, line 21
def remove_multiparameter_id(key)
  key.to_s.gsub(/\(.+/, '')
end
